name: Power Please!
description:
Power Please!

Power please is a resource management game where you play as technician for a nuclear reactor about to explode. 

Your job is it to manage the power demand of the 4 districts where people are trying to escaping out of the blast radius.

Creacted by:

  • Fuchsiano (Programming)
  • Calgan (Art + Music)
  • Neoministein (Programming + Art)
